name: datauri
description: A simple DataURI scheme module and client for Node.js

scripts.test: npm run check && npm run coveralls
scripts.coverage-html: touch test/coverage/results.html && mocha --recursive --ui bdd --timeout 3000 --reporter html-cov --require blanket > test/coverage/results.html
scripts.ci: npm run coverage && npm run coveralls
scripts.fulltest: npm run clean-deps && npm install && npm run build && npm run spec
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && babel -d dist/ src/
scripts.watch: npm run clean &&  mkdir -p dist && babel -w -d dist/ src/
scripts.check: npm run build && npm run spec

author: Helder Santana
